reviewText: Great combo. Please note that there are 2 individual Blu Rays included, not just one: one for Ice Age 1 which includes a short and additional items, plus a second Blu Ray for Ice Age 2: The Meltdown. The second disc includes shorts, deleted scenes, etc.
My son of 2 years adores this saga, and am personally excited to add these to our families personal collection. Happy media!
